overview: Being an unorthodox and loose adaptation of the classic myth of Orpheus and Eurydice, Amour focuses more on the isolationism from everyone else than the love between the two. The myth is rewritten to further explore the themes of isolationism and existentialism through seemingly the only two people in the universe BÃ©la and Danny.
tagline: If you could be anywhere in the universe for one moment, where would you go?
title: Amour
